      • layoutZoomLevel

        public static float layoutZoomLevel
        can't be neg value. 15 means 15x(2000%) zooming. Starting from version 3.12beta2 (which introduces enhancements in transparency composing and color blending) we recommend using 11 as the max level, higher levels will reduce performance

      • layoutZoomLevelClip

        public static float layoutZoomLevelClip
        can't be neg value. 2 means 2x(200%) zooming. when zoom value greater than this, it clip pages as many small bitmaps.

      • fling_dis

        public static float fling_dis
        fling distance: 0.5-2

      • setAnnotTransparency

        public static void setAnnotTransparency(int color)

        default value: 0x200040FF
        Parameters:

      • Init

        public static boolean Init(android.content.ContextWrapper act,
                           int license_type,
                           java.lang.String company_name,
                           java.lang.String mail,
                           java.lang.String serial)
        global initialize function. it load JNI library and write some data to memory.
        Parameters:
        act - Context object must derived from CoontextWrapper, native get package name from this Activity, and then check package name.
        license_type - 0: standard license, 1: professional license, 2: premium license.
        company_name -
        mail -
        serial -
        Returns:

      • ToDIBPoint

        public static void ToDIBPoint(Matrix mat,
                              float[] ppoint,
                              float[] dpoint)
        map PDF point to DIB point.
        Parameters:
        mat - Matrix object defined scale, rotate, tranlate operations.
        ppoint - input point in PDF coordinate system. [x, y]
        dpoint - output point in DIB coordinate system. [x, y]

      • ToPDFPoint

        public static void ToPDFPoint(Matrix mat,
                              float[] dpoint,
                              float[] ppoint)
        map DIB point to PDF point.
        Parameters:
        mat - Matrix object defined scale, rotate, tranlate operations.
        dpoint - input point in DIB coordinate system. [x, y]
        ppoint - output point in PDF coordinate system. [x, y]

      • ToDIBRect

        public static void ToDIBRect(Matrix mat,
                             float[] prect,
                             float[] drect)
        map PDF rectangle to DIB rectangle.
        Parameters:
        mat - Matrix object defined scale, rotate, tranlate operations.
        prect - input rect in PDF coordinate system. [left, top, right, bottom]
        drect - output rect in DIB coordinate system. [left, top, right, bottom]

      • ToPDFRect

        public static void ToPDFRect(Matrix mat,
                             float[] drect,
                             float[] prect)
        map DIB rectangle to PDF rectangle.
        Parameters:
        mat - Matrix object defined scale, rotate, tranlate operations.
        drect - input rect in DIB coordinate system. [left, top, right, bottom]
        prect - output rect in PDF coordinate system. [left, top, right, bottom]

      • ToDIBPoint

        public static void ToDIBPoint(float ratio,
                              int dib_h,
                              float[] ppoint,
                              float[] dpoint)
        map PDF point to DIB point.
        Parameters:
        ratio - scale value apply to page rendering.
        dib_h - height of render bitmap.
        ppoint - input point in PDF coordinate system. [x, y]
        dpoint - output point in DIB coordinate system. [x, y]

      • ToPDFPoint

        public static void ToPDFPoint(float ratio,
                              int dib_h,
                              float[] dpoint,
                              float[] ppoint)
        map DIB point to PDF point.
        Parameters:
        ratio - scale value apply to page rendering.
        dib_h - height of render bitmap.
        dpoint - input point in DIB coordinate system. [x, y]
        ppoint - output point in PDF coordinate system. [x, y]

      • ToDIBRect

        public static void ToDIBRect(float ratio,
                             int dib_h,
                             float[] prect,
                             float[] drect)
        map PDF rectangle to DIB rectangle.
        Parameters:
        ratio - scale value apply to page rendering.
        dib_h - height of render bitmap.
        prect - input rect in PDF coordinate system. [left, top, right, bottom]
        drect - output rect in DIB coordinate system. [left, top, right, bottom]

      • ToPDFRect

        public static void ToPDFRect(float ratio,
                             int dib_h,
                             float[] drect,
                             float[] prect)
        map DIB rectangle to PDF rectangle.
        Parameters:
        ratio - scale value apply to page rendering.
        dib_h - height of render bitmap.
        drect - input rect in DIB coordinate system. [left, top, right, bottom]
        prect - output rect in PDF coordinate system. [left, top, right, bottom]
